name: Torpedo: A Stewardess Training Program
description:
Can you pass the stewardess training program and tame the irresistible TORPEDO?

Small game inspired by the MGA2020 gamejam theme - rocket torpedo something - and the classic scene from Dr Strangelove.

Made in 10h, after 2 failed attempts at different directions on a 48h gamejam.

IN CASE OF ERRORS - CLICK 'R' TO RESTART
